General.Name: All Cosmos Bio-Tech Holding Corp
General.Description: All Cosmos Bio-Tech Holding Corporation, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells bio-organic and bio-chemical compound fertilizers in Malaysia. It also engages in the research and development of microorganisms for waste disposal of oil-palm; and wholesale of probiotics. In addition, the company is involved in the research and forest plantation activities. It also exports its products to Malaysia, Taiwan, Indonesia, Vietnam, and China. All Cosmos Bio-Tech Holding Corporation was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in George Town, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: One Nexus Way, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-9005
